formalpara.title: Figure 8. Structure of dimeric human CSL-NICD-MAM ternary complexes bound to HES-1 DNA.
formalpara.para: Figure shows two CSL-NICD-MAM ternary complexes bound to the HES-1 SPS for Notch components from humans. CSL, NICD, and MAM are colored green, blue, and red, respectively. The DNA is colored grey. A magenta asterisk denotes the site of cooperative interactions between the ANK domains of NICD.
